game_description: ER School is a VR educational program on medical practice of emergency rescue. The program provides two core medical rescue skills : CPR and AED. Users can learn how to act by practicing skills in virtual emergency situations. Plus, it teaches how to wisely react and what do to in those situations. The program can be used as a best educational material in places such as hospitals, schools, offices and other facilities. Moreover, this is easy and useful to public as well.
